---
title: 5. Github enterprise login
---

If you have a Github Enterprise license there is one additional login step before you will be able to push or pull changes to and from Github.

6.  **Login to Github desktop through Github.com**

    1.  Open Github desktop, navigate to "File", and select "Options"

        ![](images/GithubEnterpriseLogin.PNG)

    2.  Select "Sign into GitHub.com" and navigate to the browser window that is opened.

        ![](images/signIntoGitHub.PNG)

    3.  Sign into Github.com as usual and provide any two-step authentication required. Once you have logged in, you can close browser and continue with Github desktop.
